mapper.insert: insert into db_productfordescr (SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, CREATETIME, SELLSKU, 'LANGUAGE', RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, DESCR, RESERVE1, DESCR2, DESCR3, DESCR4, DESCR5) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sellsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_productfordescr set OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SELLSKU = #{sellsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'LANGUAGE' = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR2 = #{descr2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR3 = #{descr3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR4 = #{descr4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR5 = #{descr5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, CREATETIME, SELLSKU, 'LANGUAGE', RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, DESCR, RESERVE1, DESCR2, DESCR3, DESCR4, DESCR5 from db_productfordescr where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, CREATETIME, SELLSKU, 'LANGUAGE', RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, DESCR, RESERVE1, DESCR2, DESCR3, DESCR4, DESCR5 from db_productfordescr
